mapper.select: select d.dra_no draNo , kc.descript draftType , a.mid_app midApp , me.ename midAppName , a.final_app finApp , fe.ename finalAppName , re.emp_no referEmpNo , re.ename referName , de.emp_no drafterNo , de.ename drafterName , d.title title , d.content content , d.create_date createDate , a.mid_app_date midDate , a.final_app_date finalDate , sc.descript approvalState from draft d inner join approval a on d.dra_no = a.dra_no left join common_code kc on d.kind = kc.common_code left join common_code sc on a.state = sc.common_code left join refer r on a.app_no = r.app_no left join emp re on r.emp_no = re.emp_no left join emp de on d.emp_no = de.emp_no left join emp me on a.mid_app = me.emp_no left join emp fe on a.final_app = fe.emp_no where d.emp_no = #{empNo} and d.dra_no = #{draNo}

select d.dra_no draNo , kc.descript draftType , d.title title , d.content content , d.create_date createDate , sc.descript approvalState from draft d inner join approval a on d.dra_no = a.dra_no inner join common_code kc on d.kind = kc.common_code inner join common_code sc on a.state = sc.common_code where d.emp_no = #{empNo}
